name: py-requirements-parser

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This is a small Python module for parsing Pip requirement files. The
goal is to parse everything in the Pip requirement file format spec.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: mongodb
dependent_to.description:
MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database
program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like
documents with optional schemas.
